Reviews.Title: Was expecting slightly more in terms of ergonomics
Reviews.Author: A. Goldsmith "Media Hound"
Reviews.Content: This review will be extremely brief and only focus on my one complaint, and that is that the ear cups are too small for me, they are definitely on the smaller size compared to some of their other newer models.  Otherwise it's Sony at it's best; crisp, clear sound with no distortion, hum or static.

Reviews.Title: Extra Bass Headphones
Reviews.Author: Rick Weber
Reviews.Content: I have Bose noise canceling headphones. They are far superior to Sony's, so I was reluctant to buy these Sony Extra Bass Headphones, but they are fantastic.  None of that high pitched hiss that the noise canceling Sonys have.  Great even without the extra amplifier that hasn't arrived yet.
